studyArms.name: ALXN1840
studyArms.description: Participants receive ALXN1840 15 mg/day for approximately 28 days followed by titration up to 30 mg/day starting on Day 29.

studyCohorts.name: Cohort 1 (Treatment-experienced)
studyCohorts.characteristic: Patients who have received Wilson Disease therapy for > 28 days

studyCohorts.name: Cohort 2 (Treatment-naïve)
studyCohorts.characteristic: Patients who have received Wilson Disease therapy for ≤ 28 days

arms.name: ALXN1840
arms.description: Participants receive ALXN1840 15 mg/day for approximately 28 days followed by titration up to 30 mg/day starting on Day 29.

cohorts.name: Cohort 1 (Treatment-experienced)
cohorts.characteristic: Patients who have received Wilson Disease therapy for > 28 days

cohorts.name: Cohort 2 (Treatment-naïve)
cohorts.characteristic: Patients who have received Wilson Disease therapy for ≤ 28 days

epochs.name: Run-in Period
epochs.description: Day -7 through Day -1. Includes diet equilibration and measurement of pretreatment copper and molybdenum balance.

epochs.name: Treatment Period 1 (15 mg)
epochs.description: Day 1 through approximately Day 28. Participants receive ALXN1840 15 mg/day. Includes Inpatient Period 1 (Day 1-9) and an Outpatient Period.

epochs.name: Treatment Period 2 (30 mg)
epochs.description: Day 29 through Day 40. Participants titrate to ALXN1840 30 mg/day. Includes Inpatient Period 2.
